message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a very competitive price of $13,500. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $13,500 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $13,500 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle again?
